column16:
Use #T8_lee
to share tech about this character on Twitter

column2:
Can perform the enhanced version of several moves
without perfect input at the cost of Heat meter.
Gains access to df+3+4 and d+1+2

column7:
Fast counterhit launcher you can use to challenge situations 
 You can also use it in punish situations. Requires a perfect 
 input.

A fast and safe mid heat engager that can be used as
 an approaching tool. If spaced well, can create spacing traps
 due to its pushback.
Quick heat engager out of HMS.

Quick jab to start offense and check situations. It also has 
 several situationally useful follow-ups.
Mid poke to check situations and harass the opponent.

A jab string with high crushing properties. Can be counterhit 
 confirmed into the third hit for a knockdown.

Risky but strong low option to harass opponent that stand 
 block too much.

column2:
uf+1+2 (throw)
heat on 4,4:4~F
heat on df+4,4~F

column7: High crushing low that launches on counterhit. Shifts to HMS

Strong counterhit that can be used to keep opponents from 
 approaching you. Shifts to HMS.
Homing mid that launches on counterhit. Shifts to HMS.

Slide attack that is the core of his full crouch mixup game.
 You can crouch next to the opponent when you have a read
 they will play defensively, then mix this low with his ws+2,3
 or other safer options.

column12: After tornado, use b,b+4 into Heat Burst to extend the combo.

f+2,1 for long distance and d+2 for short wall carry.
You can also use b+2,4 to set up low wallsplat HMS combo.
You can use f,f+3 for wall break and b+4 to break floor.
